page.title: 17TOURISM
page.content:
THERE ARE FIVE HOTELS IN BRORA . THEY ARE CALLED THE LINKS, THE SUTHERLAND ARMS , THE BAVIEW , THE BRAES AND THE MARINE . THE MARINE IS A THREE STAR HOTEL . THEY HAVE GOT A BIG CURLING RINK AND A SWIMMING POOL. THE LINKS HAS SHOOTING, FISHING AND SWIMMING FACILITIES . THE BAYVIEW IS TWO STAR
HOTEL. IT HAS TWELVE BEDROOMS WHICH ARE OF THE BEST QUALITY .THE SUTHERLAND ARMS AND THE BRAES HOTELS ARE THE SMALLEST AND ARE RIGHT IN THE MIDDLE OF BRORA . YOU GET DRINKS AND THERE ARE QUITE A LOT OF BEDROOMS. BESIDE THE LINKS AND THE MARINE IS A FULL SIZE 18 HOLE GOLF COURSE. IT STRETCHES RIGHT DOWN TO THE BEACH, WHICH IS NOT STONEY . THERE ARE FISHING TRIPS AND IF YOU PAY Â£1 YOU WILL BE A MEMBER AND BE ABLE TO GET ON FREE .
